location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is filed in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the operation of the Foreign Office Account of the British Agency, Sharjah. The papers consist of correspondence between staff of the British Agency, Sharjah and the Political Agency, Bahrain; and statement of Dubai Post Office deposits for the period September 1948 - July 1949.
